title: Ticket #4812: Be able to dump DAG node status file to dagman.out for testing
description: It would be nice to have an option to dump the DAG node status file to the dagman.out file, so we have a record of how it changed over time to help with debugging. There's a compile-time option in the code to write to a new status file each time, but that still gets overwritten if you are in recovery mode.
remarks:
2015-Mar-27 13:55:50 by wenger:
Or maybe a better way to do this is to have an "append" option for the node status file. (Maybe just specify "NODE_STATUS_FILE <file> APPEND" in the DAG.)
creator: wenger
